Subject: Term 2 Begins – All students report back to school
Description: First day of Term 2. All students must report back to school in full uniform.

Subject: Class Orientation Days (New students meet teachers & tour facilities)
Description: New students will meet their teachers and tour the school facilities. Parents welcome to attend.

Subject: Public Holiday – Civic Day (No school)
Description: School closed for Civic Day public holiday. No classes or activities.

Subject: Clubs & Societies Registration Opens
Description: Registration opens for all after-school clubs and societies. Students can sign up for their preferred activities.

Subject: First Weekly Assessment – English & Math (Years 4–8)
Description: Weekly assessment covering English and Mathematics for students in Years 4-8.

Subject: After-School Activities Resume (3:30 PM – 5:00 PM)
Description: All after-school activities and clubs resume. Activities include sports

Subject: Digital Learning & Online Safety – 5:30 PM in the Auditorium
Description: Parent seminar on digital learning tools and online safety for children. All parents encouraged to attend.

Subject: House Color Day – Students wear house t-shirts and engage in team-building games
Description: Students wear their house t-shirts and participate in team-building activities and games.

Subject: Mid-Term Exams – Years 6 to 11
Description: Mid-term examinations for students in Years 6-11. Regular class schedule suspended during exam period.

Subject: School Open Day – Prospective parents and students tour the school (10 AM – 2 PM)
Description: Open day for prospective parents and students. School tours

Subject: Supporting Your Child's Academic Progress – 6:00 PM in the Library
Description: Parent seminar on how to support your child's academic progress at home. Practical tips and strategies.

Subject: School Photo Day – All students to wear formal school uniform
Description: Professional school photos will be taken. All students must wear complete formal school uniform.

Subject: End of Month Review Tests (Years 1–5)
Description: End of month review tests for students in Years 1-5. Covers all subjects taught during the month.
